Description:
Detects a suspicious call to the user32.dll function that locks the user workstation

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious Workstation Locking via Rundll32
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((process_path like '%\rundll32.exe' and original_file_name = 'rundll32.exe') and parent_process_path like '%\cmd.exe' and command like '%user32.dll,%' and command like '%lockworkstation%')
